summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1238 for the improvement of Fifth Avenue North, from Prospect Street to a point one hundred twenty (120) feet south of Galer Street, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing therein a sewer of proper dimensions, together with all necessary wyes, manholes, catch basins lampholes, flush tanks, openings and other appurtenances, under Ordinance No. 13508 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
